title: Morde ult cancelling heimer ult+w
body:
this is a bug I had earlier today, I don't really know if this is also true for other ults/abilities.
I was playing vs a mordekaiser and we got in a fight, he walked through my turrets and got decent low so I turned around and pressed ult and then w, to send out a few waves of rockets, after the first wave was fired I was warped to the realm but instead of firing off the other rockets heimer cancelled his ult... heimers ult doesn't even get cancelled when stunned or when flashing or when teleporting with ryze ult so why would it cancel when going to mordes realm?

Let me know if this is a bug or not and if other abilities also get cancelled like this

replies.body:
It's not a bug. It's to do with how the Death Realm works. 

Think of it as a parallel Summoner's Rift. Both spaces are separate. So an ability that you cast on SR does not exist and will not deal damage in the Death Realm.

Yeah, not a bug. You need to use it after he picks you. If he realms you mid-case, then he's simply outplayed you.

Death Realm isn't a movement ability. That's why it doesn't function like one.
It's not a bug. It didn't cancel the ability. You just moved to a different realm - the Realm of Death - and you didn't bring the rockets with you.
